column4: (a little off topic 4)d4RMONKEY : you get payed for that job man ? cause its crazy in this place... and how can you do that???
nope, I wish I did, I'm 14 and need some sort of job to make money, I'm just super bored right now, and don't feel like watching TV...
its something to do when I'm on the computer and get really bored, plus I feel like I'm giving back to the community
